verses.verse: From: Paul, a missionary of Jesus, the Anointed King, in line with a directive of God, our Rescuer and Master, Jesus, the Anointed King, our anticipation of good.
To: Timothy, a real child in trust. Generosity, forgiving kindness, peace out from our Father God and Jesus, the Anointed King, our Master.
Just as I encouraged you to still stay in Ephesus as I was traveling to Macedonia so that you might pass the order on to some not to be teaching a different doctrine,
nor to be paying attention to myths and endless genealogies, some that provide questionings rather than the construction of God in trust;
the conclusion of the order is love from a clean heart, a good conscience, and trust that is not faked,
of which, after some missed the target, they were turned from it to empty chatter,
wanting to be law teachers, not being aware of both what they say and about what they thoroughly authenticate.
We realize that the law is nice if someone uses it according to the rules,

realizing this, that the law is not lying here for a person who does what is right, but for criminals and unruly people, for godless and sinful people, for unholy and profane people, for father-beaters and mother-beaters, for murderers,
for people who commit sexual sin, for homosexuals, for human traffickers, for liars, for oath breakers, and if something different lies in opposition to the instruction that is healthy
in line with the good news of the magnificence of the blessed God that I was trusted with.
And I have generosity for the One who gave ability to me, the Anointed King Jesus, our Master, because He regarded me to be trustable when He put me into the job of serving,
though the prior time I was a hurtful person, a persecutor, and an injurer. But I was shown forgiving kindness because, being unaware, I did it in a lack of trust.
The generosity of our Master greatly increased with the trust and love in the Anointed King Jesus.
The message is trustable and deserving of every bit of acceptance, that the Anointed King Jesus came into the world to rescue sinful people of whom I am first.

But because of this, I was shown forgiving kindness so that in me first Jesus, the Anointed King, might display every bit of the patience to a prototype of the people who are going to be trusting based on Him for life that spans all time.
To the King of the spans of time (the undeteriorating, invisible, only insightful God) belongs value and magnificence for the spans of time of the spans of time. Amen.
I am placing this order beside you, child Timothy, in line with the preachings going ahead over you so that you may serve in the military of these, the nice military service,
having trust and a good conscience that some, after pushing away, were shipwrecked concerning the trust,
of whom are Hymenaeus and Alexander, whom I turned over to the Opponent so that they might be disciplined to not be saying hurtful things.
